Name: Hundred-Handed One
Traits: Reactive. The giant can take one reaction on every turn in a combat. Vigilant. The giant can't be surprised.
Actions: Multiattack. The giant makes four longsword attacks or two rock attacks. Longsword. Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) slashing damage. Rock. Ranged Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
Reactions: Deflect Attack. The giant adds 5 to its AC against one weapon attack that would hit it. To do so, the giant must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
